pages.text: $(l)Hel Walkers$() are undead warriors from Helheim, the realm of the dead. $(br2)These restless souls, unable to find peace due to the corruption of the Valkyries by Odin, have spilled over into Midgard, causing widespread desolation. $(br2)Hel Walkers are characterized by their ghastly blue and white coloration, covered in frost, with a terrifying, skeletal visage. $(br2)These undead warriors are relentless and aggressive, attacking with brute strength and savage frost magic that can freeze their enemies. They are very fast and are often found in $(l)snowy biomes$(), spreading the cold and despair of Helheim wherever they go.
Some of them drop a small amount of $(l:resources/hacksilver)Hacksilver$() after death.
